contexts.context: .... "I can't see the coastline at all. But <mark>that's</mark> not all. I haven't found anything edible anywhere....
...either be rich or dead," said S'Riizh. <mark>"That's</mark> a comfort."
...things with the guards at a discount rate. <mark>That's</mark> where the 'honor among thieves' part comes in. Friends...
...through the streets. Even in Tel Aruhn, <mark>that's</mark> likely to warrant suspicion.
